mapper.select: select a.id, to_char(a.created,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as created, to_char(a.modified,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as modified, a.comment_id, concat(b.last_name,b.first_name) as comment_name, a.comment_type, a.comment, a.practice_result_id from internal_exams_useranswer_comment a join auth_user b on a.comment_id = b.id where a.practice_result_id = #{practice_result_id} and a.comment_type = #{comment_type}
mapper.insert: insert into internal_exams_useranswer_comment ( created, modified, comment_id, comment_type, comment, practice_result_id ) values ( now(), now(), #{comment_id}, #{comment_type}, #{comment}, #{practice_result_id} )

insert into internal_exams_useranswer_comment_log ( created, modified, comment_id, comment_type, comment, practice_result_id ) select created, modified, comment_id, comment_type, comment, practice_result_id from internal_exams_useranswer_comment where practice_result_id = #{practice_result_id} and comment_type = #{comment_type}
